(66581, 69578).description: The water held in the soil, which is essential for plant growth and development

(66581, 69578).name: ground water
(66581, 69578).label: variable
(66581, 69578).description: Water stored beneath the Earth's surface, which can be used for human consumption, agriculture, and other purposes

(66581, 69578).name: surface water
(66581, 69578).label: variable
(66581, 69578).description: Water that flows over the land or is stored in lakes, rivers, and wetlands, which can be used for human consumption, agriculture, and other purposes

(66581, 69578).name: aquifer water bodies
(66581, 69578).label: location
(66581, 69578).description: Underground layers of permeable rock or soil that store and transmit large amounts of water, which can be used for human consumption, agriculture, and other purposes

(66581, 69578).name: planting and harvesting calendar
(66581, 69578).label: variable
(66581, 69578).description: A schedule that outlines the optimal times for planting and harvesting crops, taking into account factors such as climate, soil, and water availability

(69324, 69578).name: water and soil resources
(69324, 69578).label: location
(69324, 69578).description: The natural resources of water and soil that are essential for maintaining ecosystems and supporting life on Earth

(69324, 69578).name: biodiversity
(69324, 69578).label: variable
(69324, 69578).description: The variety of different plants, animals, and microorganisms that live in an ecosystem or on Earth as a whole

(69324, 69578).name: ecosystems
(69324, 69578).label: location
(69324, 69578).description: The complex networks or biological communities of interacting organisms and their physical environment
